description: It's the middle of the baseball season and star pitcher Jay Cloud has injured his hamstrings, so now he must get some massage therapy. As it turns out, his friend Joey Hard has just earned his license and been promoted from assistant to full-fledged therapist.Rubbing Jay down, Joey gets a little excited, and he can tell from Jay's growing boner that the feeling is reciprocal. Now Jay is a pitcher on the field and fairly good at pitching the meat around as well, but after they trade off going down on each other, and after Jay has had his fill of Joey's ass, Joey finds a way to convince Jay to play catcher for a while, and before you know it, Joey is loosening up Jay's muscles from the inside.Enjoy!
title: Rubbed Hard
